front.title: IP over Optical Networks: A Summary of Issues

abstract.t: This draft presents a summary of issues related to transmission ofIP packets over optical networks. This is a compilation of manydrafts presented so far in IETF. The goal is to create a commondocument, which by including all the views and proposals will serveas a better reference point for further discussion. The novelty ofthis draft is that we try to cover all the main areas of integrationand deployment of IP and optical networks including architecture,routing, signaling, management, and survivability.
